name: Untitled Rope Game
description:
Submission for Mix and Game Jam 2019! The theme was "Dimension Change: Take a game mechanic from one dimension and recreate it in another"

The mechanic I recreated is the ninja rope from the Worms series. It's also extremely heavily inspired by a small game called Floating Point.

  • Left Mouse tethers you to a cube and can be held to reel you in
  • Right Mouse releases your tether
  • Swing around and try to touch the pillars of light. The faster you're moving the more points they give!
  • Tip: Remember the law of Conservation of Angular Momentum! Try grappling to cubes that are perpendicular to the direction you're moving in in order to best maintain your speed.
